quote: Thoughts become things. If you see it in your mind, you will hold it in your hand. – Bob Proctor
fact: Giraffes and rats can last longer without water than camels.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke:
My friend keeps telling me "Cheer up. You aren't stuck in a deep hole in the ground, filled with water."
I know he means well.
